titleStmt.title: A brief apology in behalf of the people in derision call'd Quakers written for the information of our sober and well-inclined neighbors in and about the town of Warminster in the county of Wilts. by Wil. Chandler, Alex. Pyott, Jo. Hodges, and some others.
titleStmt.author: Chandler, William.
Pyott, Alex. (Alexander)
Hodges, Jo.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Northcott ... and are to be sold by William Longford bookseller in Warminster,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
